channel.title: Data Science & Global Change Ecology on ESPM 157
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science & Global Change Ecology on ESPM 157

item.description: Date Lesson Topics Reading Lecture Assignment 01-27 Introduction 02-03 Climate Change: Intro data exploration, visualization 02-10 Climate Change 2 data wrangling, vis 02-17 Climate Change 3 RMarkdown, reproduce ex 02-24 Population Dynamics 1 programming: functions, loops 03-03 Population Dynamics 2 stochasticity 03-10 Population Dynamics 3 R packages, reproduce ex 03-17 Fisheries Collapse 1 Relational databases 3-24 Fisheries Collapse 2 4-7 Fisheries Collapse 3 4-14 Extinction Rates 1 Online data, APIs, JSON, Regex 4-21 Extinction Rates 2 4-28 Extinction Rates 3 5-5 Work on Final Projects

item.title: Example RMarkdown post
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.

item.title: Policies
item.description: Prerequisites You should be generally numerically literate, and some prior programming experience will be helpful. Students new to programming might find Hands on Programming with R to be helpful. Students with significant experience in programming and statistical analysis should find themselves well prepared but should find plenty still to learn in each lesson. Instructional Methods As a flipped classroom, students are provided with either reading or video material that they are expected to view/read prior to class.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Welcome to Tranquilpeak 0.3.1-BETA
item.description: Tranquilpeak is a gorgeous responsive theme for Hugo blog framework. It has many features and integrated services to improve user experience.

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

item.title: Data Science & Global Change Ecology
item.description: * * Instructor Carl Boettiger GSI TBD Location Mulford 230 Times Tu/Th 12:30P - 2:00P CCN 46582 Course Description Many of the greatest challenges we face today come from understanding and interacting with the natural world: from global climate change to the sudden collapse of fisheries and forests, from the spread of disease and invasive species to the unknown wealth of medical, cultural, and technological value we derive from nature.
